column4: hey im trying to set up different wallpapers for each workspace and every tutorial i read it says to edit: "/apps/nautilus/preferences/show_desktop" but for some reason show_desktop isnt there
i would guess they are for the older gnome. not gnome3
ActionParsnip: well i have a dual screen setup going on and want different wallpapers on each screen
thats totally differnt then what you asked... workspaces.. vs monitorsa.
